text: Zvirokwazvo, Allah vakatenga kubva kuvatendi hupenyu hwavo uye midziyo yavo kuti chavo chichave Paradhiso. Vanorwa munzira yaAllah, nokudaro vanouraya (vamwe) uye vanourawa. Chivimbiso chechokwadi chakakomekedzwa kwavari (Allah) muTorah uye muInjeel (Vhangeri) uye muQurâ€™aan. Uye ndiani ari pachokwadi pawirirano yake kudarika Allah? Nokudaro farai mukutengesa kwenyu kwamakapedza. Iyi ndiyo budiriro hombe
